name: Easy page templates info
author: Milan Stojanov

sections.description: If you are a WordPress theme developer, this little plugin is a great tool for you. It will add a new column next to page title in WP-Admin->Pages, and let you know what template file is used for every page. Also, it makes possible to filter pages by registred template files in the system (please see Screenshots section to see it in action).
sections.installation:
The instalation process is simple:

  1. Upload ms-template.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins menu in WordPress
sections.faq: Everything should work nicely, but for any problem you can mail me milan.stojanov@outlook.com

short_description: This plugin adds a new column in WP-Admin->Pages which will let you know what template file is used for every page.
